pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, July 6, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, July 6, 2016:

Sun Valley, Idaho, United States of America

The Prime Minister will attend the Allen & Company Sun Valley Conference.

Closed to media.


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
